iaik.pdf.parameters

Class LegalContentAttestation

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pdf.parameters.LegalContentAttestation

  • public class LegalContentAttestation
extends java.lang.Object
    A Legal Content Attestation can be added when creating certification signatures, in order to specify the PDF capabilities which may affect the signed document (e.g. JavaScript). In the attestation text the author can provide further information about the document's integrity.
    See Also:
    PdfSignatureInstance.certify(iaik.pdf.signature.CertificationSignature.ModificationPermission, LegalContentAttestation)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LegalContentAttestation.ContentType
      Possible PDF content types that may effect the presentation of the document's content.

      • addEntry

        public void addEntry(LegalContentAttestation.ContentType content,
                     int occurrences)
        Add entry for the given content type
        Parameters:
        content - the content type contained in the document
        occurrences - number, how often content of this type occurs in the document

      • setOptionalContentFlag

        public void setOptionalContentFlag(boolean included)
        Set whether document contains object of PDF type "optional content"
        Parameters:
        included - set to true, if such objects are contained

      • getOptionalContentFlag

        public boolean getOptionalContentFlag()
        Returns:
        true, if this legal content attestation claims, that document contains objects of PDF type "optional content".

      • getEntries

        public java.util.HashMap<LegalContentAttestation.ContentType,java.lang.Integer> getEntries()
        Returns:
        Stated content types, to be contained in the document, and their number of occurrences

      • getContentType

        public static LegalContentAttestation.ContentType getContentType(java.lang.String content)
                                                          throws PdfSignatureException
        Get the corresponding content type for the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        content - Identifier used for this content type.
        Returns:
        The corresponding content type
        Throws:
